Text: How do i watch this? (im not stupid or anything i dont normally download files like this)

Hi derp247

First thing download VLC, from http://www.videolan.org/vlc
if you don't have. Then right click on the directory where you download all those files and 
select "Play with VLC". 
VLC is a free application and safer thn Microsoft crap, you can play many video formats with it.
